column1: Smoque BBQ////First of all I was not impressed at all with their BBQ ribs nor with their brisket. The first time I went I ordered the ribs and I did not like their BBQ sauce
column2: it was too tangy and full of Smoque flavor that to be honest it was overpowering for me. Their meat was hard to come off the bone
column3: i felt like i was fighting it off the bone and was more chewy than tender. I did like the mac and cheese I just wish they would serve bigger sides
column4: you can literally pick it all up at once with a spoon.
